data.actual_result: It closes but a new invite will be generated according to the changes you made (as if you pressed "Generate link")
data.expected_result: It should either close the settings and dismiss the changes (as if you pressed Back button) or not close at all
data.short_description: If you have create invite settings open, rotating your screen OR using Android 7 split screen will generate a new invite as if you tapped on "Generate link"
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you have Create Invite permissions  - Open Create Invite screen - Tap on the gear icon to open invite settings - Change something but don't submit your changes - Rotate your screen OR use Android 7 split screen
